TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintPreviewControl extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示從 Windows Form 應用程式預覽列印時，未經處理的預覽部分，沒有任何對話方塊或按鈕。

span.span: Represents the raw preview part of print previewing from a Windows Forms application, without any dialog boxes or buttons.

summary.span: 多數的 物件在 物件上被發現，但它們不一定要被發現。

span.span: Most objects are found on objects, but they do not have to be.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體類別，部分讀取/寫入屬性會設定為初始值。When you create an instance of the class, some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 如需有關使用 Windows Form 列印的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間概觀。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果您想要從 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ，並的屬性。The following code example demonstrates the , , and properties of the . 若要執行此範例中，下列程式碼置於表單並呼叫`InitializePrintPreviewControl`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, place the following code in a form and call the `InitializePrintPreviewControl` method from the form’s constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，則方法會調整大小的比例頁面控制項。If the property is set to `true`, the method resizes the page in proportion to the control. 如果已`false`，則中心上控制項的頁面。If is `false`, the centers the page on the control.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`PrintPreviewControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `PrintPreviewControl1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
